sentences.sentence: Tired of waiting, the Assassins called to him mockingly, "Goodby till tomorrow."
sentences.translation: 刺客们等得不耐烦了，便嘲弄地对他喊道：“明天见。”

sentences.sentence: The soldier brought his halberd to a present-arms and said mockingly, "I salute your gracious Highness."
sentences.translation: 那个卫兵举起他的戟致敬，并嘲弄地说：“我给尊敬的殿下敬礼。”

sentences.sentence: And it jabbers laughing pain-crying mockingly.
sentences.translation: 而它叽里咕噜，又是大笑又是痛哭，嘲笑着。
